sentences.english: From all walks of life, they have cultivated strong English listening and speaking skills。
sentences.chinese: 他們來自各行各業，均已練就了超強的英文聽說能力。

sentences.english: So I'm meeting all kinds of walks of life, and it's awesome.
sentences.chinese: 所以我碰見的是各行各業的人，棒極了。

sentences.english: Credit rationing has implications for all sectors of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 信貸配給對經濟體中的各行各業都有潛在影響。

sentences.english: Although e-commerce quickly flied red all walks of life.
sentences.chinese: 雖然電子商務迅速躥紅的各行各業。

sentences.english: There are snake-oil salesmen in every line of business.
sentences.chinese: 在各行各業都有賣“萬靈油”的推銷員。

sentences.english: Over the years, which aims to produce a large number of high-precision molds.
sentences.chinese: 歷年來爲各行各業生產了大量高精度的模具。

sentences.english: Additionally, the report analyzes the applications of SMSs across various industries.
sentences.chinese: 該報告對短信在各行各業的應用情況也進行了研究。
